channel.title: Bread on Enjoyable Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Bread on Enjoyable Recipes

item.title: Bread Poha
item.description: Well its been a long time and we have not added any recipe. One of the reason being Sumi and me being on a low-carb diet. Since its really a challenge to do it in Indian cuisine leave alone Bengali, we had to invent lots of dishes. I mean not invent but rather bend them to our tastes. One of the major problems of a low carb diet is what everyone calls a carb crash.
